bibl.title: The Oldest Inscription on the Colossus of Memnon?
bibl.note: I. Memnon 84. Takes ]ãto[u] in line 13 as the ending of a cardinal. Ka›sar refers to Augustus: this would imply that the inscription was inscribed between April 6, 21 B.C. through April 6, 11 B.C. <]ato[u]>
SIJPESTEIJN P.J., The Oldest Inscription on the Colossus of Memnon?
